title: Free Wifi Hotspot - Wifi
description:
Free New Wifi HotSpot
version is available,
New Free Wifi HotSpot
support your language. Get it at
HERE:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kitymummum.freewifihotspot to try better.
Your phones, tablets running the android operating system are able to receive wifi GPGS/3G/4G On Mobile signal from this application.
This application with lightweight data storage is able to broadcast wifi from your phone in the high-speed, secure and simple way.
Usages :
1.	Share Free Wifi network with many people without password.
Activate your WiFi Hotspot for using.
2.	Share HotSpot Free network with your favorite friends:
-	Type your Wifi HotSpot name.
-	Choose your security modes : WP2 or WPA.
-	Type your password.
-	Click save button.
-	Activate your Wifi Hotspot.
If you broadcast Wifi HotSpot network by your Mobile Phones, you can share GPGS/3G/4G network with other ones, laptops, tablets and other research devices.
With a simple click, you are able to share your Internet connection with your friends, families, business partners and an arbitrary number of WLAN-compatible devices.
No technical expertise is required for set-up.
Wifi HotSpot Free
Thanks you so much
